qsmp.subtitle: Design an informative website reflecting the atmosphere of the QSMP Minecraft server

context.title: Context
context.description1: QSMP is a multiplayer Minecraft server, created by the content creator <creator>Quackity</creator>, which brings together streamers from all over the world, speaking different languages, thanks to a real-time translation system.
context.description2: Their QSMP.co website was designed to bring together all the server's main information: online streamers, a countdown to the next server event, the list of members and their various social networks.

contribution.title: Contribution
contribution.description: Quackity's team commissioned me to design the entire showcase site, from visual identity to final interface. I also had the opportunity to interact with the developer throughout the production phase to ensure consistency between the mock-ups and the final product.

qsmp_shop.subtitle: Showcasing the first QSMP figurine collection on an online store

context.title: Context
context.description1: QSMP is a multiplayer Minecraft server, created by the content creator <creator>Quackity</creator>, which brings together streamers from all over the world, speaking different languages, thanks to a real-time translation system.
context.description2: <shop>QSMP.shop</shop> is the QSMP e-commerce site, selling merchandise related to the project. Unfortunately, this design was never put online, but it was nevertheless finalized.

contribution.title: Contribution
contribution.description: I was commissioned to design an entire Shopify site dedicated to the first collection of figurines inspired by the series' characters. As each character has a unique identity and story, I took care to reflect their uniqueness through the product cards and details pages.
